items.sentence: I wouldn\'t even know where to start looking for Tom.
I wouldn\'t want to go there with anybody except Tom.
I\'d like Tom to demonstrate how to do the butterfly.
I was in such a hurry that I forgot to lock the door.
I wish I had studied English harder when I was young.
I wonder if Tom realizes how many hours a day I work.
I won\'t go to the party if Tom is going to be there.
Tom doesn\'t know the reason why Mary went to Boston.
Tom doesn\'t make enough money to support his family.
Tom has another problem he hasn\'t told us about yet.
Tom certainly doesn\'t get along very well with Mary.
Tom certainly doesn\'t want to take advice from Mary.
Tom certainly seems to know what he\'s talking about.
Tom should\'ve done it the way you told him to do it.
Tom should\'ve let his children come camping with us.
Tom signed all the documents Mary\'s lawyer gave him.
He tried to be brave while he was being held hostage.
He was kind enough to show me the way to the station.
Her father never let her go to town with her friends.
Her husband eats everything she puts in front of him.
